entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
